'''Jason''' was in a car accident on the way from Peter Fisher's funeral.

==History==
Jason is related to the Fisher family. He attended Peter Fisher's funeral, where there was an accident that sent many of them to the hospital. When they learned Kara had caused the accident, Jason speculated that she might have been using drugs again.
